ipolis_toolbox_online.name: iPOLis ToolBox Online
ipolis_toolbox_online.detail:
Do you want to organize your surveillance system? Are you interest in Samsung Techwin’s products?

If so, iPOLiS ToolBox is the best choice to you! There is no need to download many applications to your device. ONLY one application, iPOLiS ToolBox! Find products, calculate field of view and calculate bandwidth.

All of the above are to be included in iPOLiS ToolBox.
ipolis_toolbox_online.content:
iPOLiS ToolBox includes: Product selector, FoV Calculator and Bandwidth Calculator

1. [Product Selector] Which camera/recorder is the best for me?
-Product Selector is a program that allows the user to search and select the products according to their requirements.
-When making their choice the program automatically creates a product list.
-You can then drag and drop the products onto a comparison chart and compare the detailed specifications.

2. [FoV Calculator] Calculate the camera’s visible scene.
-The field of View Calculator is a program for calculating the camera’s visible scene.
-When you choose the lens format size or camera model name, input focal length of the lens and distance between lens and object, it will then work out the dimensions of the scene.

3. [Bandwidth Calculator]
-Bandwidth Calculator is a program that estimates the network bandwidth according to the user defined video setting of network camera.
-By using a multiple set of network camera settings, it will calculate the whole Bandwidth and storage capacity for the Network Video Recorder (NVR).

Click here to view the online iPOLis ToolBox.

samsung_ip_institute.name: Samsung IP Institute
samsung_ip_institute.detail:
SIPI is designed to be the key step in certifying Samsung Dealers to work with Samsung Security Products. It is aimed at educating technical staff on how to properly program, design, and install a system. The course will review Samsung's line of products, apps and VMS software for a full end-to-end solution and is designed to be a hands-on training for the technician to ensure proper installation of Samsung Equipment.

In addition, all Gold and Silver STEP dealers are required to successfully complete this course. All participants upon completion will receive 5 CEC’s which can be utilized for industry recognized certifications such as ASIS and BICSI.
samsung_ip_institute.content:
Outline

Time Saving Tools

Best Practices

Feature Differentiators

VMS Integration

Hands on Training:

• Samsung Wisenet III Cameras • Samsung NVR Recorders • Samsung SSM software

Click here for available dates and to register

Our Partners are ready to fulfill your Samsung Techwin product needs whether it’s our reliable and cost effective analog products, our technology leading IP products. trade_shows___events.name: Trade Shows & Events
trade_shows___events.detail: Learn more about our professional video security solutions and interact with our representatives by visiting our various tradeshows and events organized all around the year.

customerservice.name: Customer Service
customerservice.detail: We strive to provide the best customer support in the industry.Please contact us if you have any questions about our products, need technical assistance or customer service support by calling us at: 877-213-1222

security_cameras.name: Security Cameras
security_cameras.detail: Hanwha Techwin’s line of camera's deliver extraordinary capabilities in both image quality, and day-to-day performance.  We offer the industry's most comprehensive selection of Analog and Network Cameras.

ip_cameras.name: IP Cameras
ip_cameras.detail: Hanwha Techwin America meets today's demand for ip camera products with a full line of ip cameras cameras. Our new line introduces 3 Megapixel ip cameras cameras in full HD resolution and other great features such as WDR (Wide Dynamic Range), SSDR (Samsung Super Noise Reduction), smart codec and more. Our line of ip cameras come fully equipped with hybrid capabilities. These hybrid ip cameras make it easy to switch from analog to IP camera nnetwork when your company is ready to make the move.

se_ip_wisenet_lite.name: Wisenet Lite
se_ip_wisenet_lite.detail: Hanwha Techwin America introduces its WiseNet Lite series, an affordable product line with simple and essential features ideal for securing small sized applications.

se_ip_box.name: Box
se_ip_box.detail: Hanwha Techwin America's IP Box Cameras are ONVIF compliant and compatible with third party integrators. These ip cameras provide industry leading performance and cutting edge technology. Most of our line of ip box cameras are hybrid, equipped to be used as an analog or an IP camera and range from VGA up to 3 megapixels in resolution. In addition, the Samsung Digital Signal Processor (DSP) delivers a wide selection of outstanding features across the entire product range.

se_ip_bullet.name: Bullet
se_ip_bullet.brief: Bullet IP Cameras are becoming more and more popular because they make installations simple.
se_ip_bullet.detail: Bullet IP Cameras are becoming more and more popular because they make installations simple.  These ip cameras come pre-packaged with camera and lens in an environmental enclosure that is IP66 rated.  All you need to do is mount it, add power and a network connection. With PoE, the power even comes via the network. Samsung offers a wide variety of configurations in analog  bullet cameras, and is now leading the way by introducing ip camera version.  You can expect to see this lineup of bullet ip camera models expanding in the coming months..

se_ip_fisheye.name: Ip Fisheye Cameras
se_ip_fisheye.brief: Features our most advanced technology with 3 megapixel 1080p high definition images.
se_ip_fisheye.detail: Hanwha Techwin America's new ip fisheye camera's feature a new 360° omni-directional surveillance range with a fisheye lens and various viewing options. This advanced technology is equipped with 3MP, 1080p high definition images.

se_ip_fixed_domes.name: Fixed Domes
se_ip_fixed_domes.brief: One of our most requested camera lines, the selection of IP fixed domes.
se_ip_fixed_domes.detail: IP Fixed dome cameras are the most widely used camera category because of their ease of installation and the fact that their appearance blends in nicely with most architectural environments.  It makes sense then, that Hanwha Techwin America would offer a wide selection of fixed dome models in their IP camera line.  From low cost indoor models to high performance environmental versions, Hanwha has what you are looking for.

se_ip_vandal_resistant_domes.name: Vandal Resistant Domes
se_ip_vandal_resistant_domes.brief: One of our most requested camera lines, the selection of IP Vandal-Resistant Domes.
se_ip_vandal_resistant_domes.detail: IP vandal-resistant dome cameras are the most widely used camera category because of their ease of installation and the fact that their appearance blends in nicely with most architectural environments.  It makes sense then, that Hanwha would offer a wide selection of IP vandal-resistant dome models in their IP fixed dome camera line.  From low cost indoor models to high performance environmental versions, Hanwha has what you are looking for.

se_ip_ptz_domes.name: Ptz Domes
se_ip_ptz_domes.brief: Samsung’s line to PTZ cameras will help you to maintain the visual connection with your subject.
se_ip_ptz_domes.detail: Pan/Tilt/Zoom (PTZ) dome cameras have become the most popular choice for applications that require the ability to position and zoom the camera to a specific area of interest.  PTZ domes offer a discreet appearance that blends into any architectural environment, and they pack a lot of performance into a relatively small package.  Hanwha has a comprehensive line of PTZ domes with models to fit a wide variety of applications.

se_ip_wireless.name: Wireless
se_ip_wireless.brief: Keep a watchful eye your home or business anytime and from anywhere.
se_ip_wireless.detail: Connect to your router with a push of a button, register your camera on-line, open your web-browser, and start monitoring. It’s that simple. And because you can view your camera on your PC, MAC, and smartphone, you can keep a watchful eye your home or business anytime and from anywhere.

analog_cameras.name: Analog Cameras
analog_cameras.detail: We are all aware that the future of security surveillance cameras are in IP products, however Hanwha Techwin America knows that analog cameras are still going strong today. Hanwha Techwin is dedicated to the goal of producing high performance analog products that introduce features and capabilities that push the boundaries and exceed market expectations.

se_an_beyond_series.name: Beyond Series
se_an_beyond_series.detail: The Beyond Series from Hanwha provides the user with a 1280H complete analog solution. Exceptional image quality through the highest resolution, outstanding backlight compensation and a multitude of user friendly functions.  Offering the best analog system solutions that goes beyond your expectation.

se_an_wisenet_hd+_series.name: WiseNet HD+ Series
se_an_wisenet_hd+_series.detail: WiseNet HD+ cameras allow users to upgrade their surveillance systems to HD using legacy coax cabling without the costly process of ripping and replacing coax with Ethernet cabling. The new WiseNet HD+ cameras offer a variety of high-performance features including Day/Night operation, motion detection, defog, IR illuminators and more depending on model. Models include box, indoor dome, outdoor vandal dome, and outdoor bullet.  Setup functions are easily controlled by OSD with the built-in joystick or control over coaxial cable with WiseNet HD+ DVRs.  Low power consumption, compact form factors, and transmission up to 1,640 feet further enhance the lineup.

se_an_box.name: Box Cameras
se_an_box.brief: Samsung’s Box Cameras provide industry leading performance.
se_an_box.detail: Hanwha Techwin America's Box Cameras provide industry leading performance, cutting edge technology and the right form factor for those applications and installations that require a box camera. And the Samsung Digital Signal Processor (DSP) delivers a wide selection of outstanding features across the entire product range.

se_an_bullet.name: Bullet Cameras
se_an_bullet.brief: Daylight, true day/night, integrated infrared and zoom models.
se_an_bullet.detail: Daylight, true day/night, integrated infrared and zoom models combine to deliver one of the most comprehensive bullet camera lines in the industry. For virtually every application where the features and foot print of the bullet camera are required, Hanwha has a model that delivers.

se_an_fixed_domes.name: Fixed Domes
se_an_fixed_domes.brief: One of our most requested camera lines, the selection of fixed domes.
se_an_fixed_domes.detail: One of our most requested camera lines, the selection of fixed domes is comprehensive and boasts an impressive array of features and functions. From indoor to vandal resistant environmental model, we have the dome cameras you’ve been looking for.

se_an_vandal_resistant_domes.name: Vandal-Resistant Domes
se_an_vandal_resistant_domes.brief: Vandal-Resistant Domes are the most widely used camera category because of their ease of installation.
se_an_vandal_resistant_domes.detail: One of our most requested camera lines, the selection of fixed domes is comprehensive and boasts an impressive array of features and functions. From indoor to vandal resistant environmental model, we have the dome cameras you’ve been looking for.

se_an_positioning_system.name: Positioning System
se_an_positioning_system.brief: With outstanding performance specifications and a robust mechanical build.
se_an_positioning_system.detail: With outstanding performance specifications and a robust mechanical build, the Samsung Positioning System product line was developed to deliver reliable performance.

se_an_ptz_cameras.name: PTZ Cameras
se_an_ptz_cameras.brief: Pan, tilt and zoom are an absolute necessity to certain security applications.
se_an_ptz_cameras.detail: Pan/Tilt/Zoom (PTZ) dome cameras have become the most popular choice for applications that require the ability to position and zoom the camera to a specific area of interest.  PTZ domes offer a discreet appearance that blends into any architectural environment, and they pack a lot of performance into a relatively small package.  Samsung has a comprehensive line of PTZ domes with models to fit a wide variety of applications.

se_an_utp_cameras.name: UTP Cameras
se_an_utp_cameras.detail: Delivering outstanding performance over UTP, our UTP camera selection is a strong representation of what the market has been asking for.  The UTP signal can be used with Samsung’s multi-camera UTP power supply for single cable installations, but it also is compatible with NVT and Nitek products. With UTP, cameras can be located up to 3000 feet away without fear of ground loops, and the signal is transmitted via CAT-5 cable.

se_mo_ssm_apps.name: SSM Apps
se_mo_ssm_apps.brief: SSM mobile app for android and iphone
se_mo_ssm_apps.detail: SSM mobile indicates a Mobile Client Application in Samsung Security Manager provided bySamsung. With SSM mobile, you can generate more efficient and convenient monitoring environment. Operators possibly monitor, control, and play video images from where they want such as a local or remote area through their smart phones and tablet devices.

se_mo_ipolis_apps.name: iPolis Apps
se_mo_ipolis_apps.brief: Smartphone application for iphone OS & Android
se_mo_ipolis_apps.detail: iPOLiS mobile app lets you to view the live video and control pan/tilt/zoom functions from your network cameras anywhere with your smartphone if you use Samsung Techwin's security system. iPOLiS mobile is a free application designed specifically for Samsung Techwin's security network product.

network_software.name: Network Software
network_software.detail: For viewing, recording, or remote management, Samsung offers a VMS solution to fit every application.  The NET-I viewer software is a free VMS package that is included with all Samsung IP cameras and encoders, and can be downloaded from our web site.  The Net-I ware package adds software-based recording capability to this.  Smart Viewer is a DVR management package that allows you to mix IP cameras and analog cameras (connected via DVRs) on a single hybrid system.

ne_ne_16_channel.name: 16 Channel
ne_ne_16_channel.brief: High-quality, high performance network video recorders supporting up to 16 network streams.

ne_ne_64_channel.name: 64 Channel
ne_ne_64_channel.brief: 64 Channel Exceptional Performance & Stability Premium Network Video Recorder

ne_sw_ethernet_switches.name: Ethernet Switches
ne_sw_ethernet_switches.brief: Samsung's systems technology offering includes Layer 2 & Layer 3 switching.

ip_kits.name: IP Kits
ip_kits.detail: Samsung’s newly introduced 4CH, 8CH and 16CH IP Kits solve surveillance challenges for small to medium sized applications. Even if you’re new to IP this kit makes it easy to setup and install within minutes, all with the click of a mouse. No PC or additional network equipment is needed. Simple Setup with Wizard allows you to control settings on the cameras from one location, reducing setup and configuration time through Samsung’s unified interface.

4_channel_ip_kit.name: 4 Channel IP Kit
4_channel_ip_kit.detail: Samsung’s newly introduced 4CH IP Kits solve surveillance challenges for small to medium sized applications. Using WiseNet Lite series and Samsung’s PoE NVR together as a network solution saves both installation time and cost, suitable for small to medium sized applications.

8_channel_ip_kit.name: 8 Channel IP Kit
8_channel_ip_kit.detail: Samsung’s newly introduced 8CH IP Kit solves surveillance challenges for small to medium sized applications. Using WiseNet Lite series and Samsung’s PoE NVR together as a network solution saves both installation time and cost, suitable for small to medium sized applications.

ne_ne_ssm_rs00.name: SSM-RS00
ne_ne_ssm_rs00.detail:
SSM-RS00

  
SSM-RS00 16CH Recording Server is designed for high quality video recording, simultaneous searching and viewing of Samsung’s network cameras/encoders. Operators maintain a complete overview using Configuration Manager easily. SSM Recording Server provides 400Mbps high performance recording, 100Mbps playback/backup throughput for supporting high quality megapixel video.  SSM Recording Server provides single access point using Configuration Manager, operators configure and control of recording functions at the same PC.

element.Overview:
Key Features:

• Add on recording module for SSM: Recording setting, live video monitoring and search/ playback of recorded video by SSM
• Up to 16CH recording  
• Deliver high performance recording (Up to 400Mbps)  
• Support various recording options  
• Multiple disk allocation and distribution for stable recording  
• Playback / back up throughput up to 100Mbps
• Supports various recording options: Continuous recording, Event based recording (including Pre / Post alarm recording, Motion detection, VA, Video loss, Alarm signal input), Scheduled recording (Including holiday set up)•
• Notification in case of event occurring: User defined alert sound output, E-mail to pre-assigned receiver, Notification to monitoring software (CMS)
• Multiple disk allocation and distribution for stable recording
• Multi-level user access and authority management

ne_ne_ssm_vm00.name: SSM-VM00
ne_ne_ssm_vm00.detail:
SSM-VM00

  
 The SSM Virtual Matrix software is an add-on to the Samsung Security Manager system.  It provides a video push, allowing monitors on a video wall to be controlled without direct manipulation of the a keyboard/mouse connected to the PC.  Operations can be made through the SSM Console Studio Virtual Matrix Controller panel or separate Virtual Matrix Manager Software.  SSM-VM provides important event-based salvo switching. Upon occurrence of configured events, the system can automatically display images in the wall spot, monitor spot or tile spot modes.SSM-VM10 supports decoding video up to 16 monitors; SSM-VM20 supports decoding video up to 36 monitors.

element.Overview:
Key Features:

• Multi-screen management solution
• Runs on standard PCs and displays
• Easy set & control through VM manager, Console
• S/W decoding (VM Decoder) & H/W decoding (SPD-400) support
• Setup rules the camera views and layouts
• Event-driven virtual salvo switching: Wall spot, Monitor spot, Tile spot function
• Live monitoring & map display simultaneously
• Multi-level user access and authority support
• Manually control by easily dragging and ping cameras into the monitor views

ne_ne_ssm.name: SSM
ne_ne_ssm.detail:
SSM 

  
SSM is a one-stop management software platform that maximizes the efficiency of Samsung’s network products (including network cameras, encoders, DVRs and NVRs). The client-server architecture features stable video surveillance system management through multi-sites and multi-clients configuration. Access to the live/recorded videos is extremely easy from remote sites making it suitable for medium to large-scale multi site applications.

element.Overview:
Key Features:

※ the users who are currently in use of former v1.03 need to manually remove the PostgreSQL and install the v1.1

• Samsung network solution is the ideal choice for a total management system
Samsung Techwin’s video surveillance products that include network cameras, encoders, DVRs and NVRs are
effortlessly managed from a single SSM platform. The SSM is provided in free of charge and is ideally suited to
optimize the performance and management of Samsung network products.

• Efficient management via Multi-site & Multi-client configuration
Numerous clients can administer video surveillance products installed across multiple sites. This helps maximize
the efficiency of the monitoring system enabling real-time management by the authorized personnel.

• Easy-to-use simple UI (User Interface)
Most of the essential functionalities required by users are possible with SSM; including simultaneous monitoring
of maps/live images, real-time event monitoring, playback and back up for each device.

• A system that offers flexibility and expandability
Adding new or replacing old devices are easily processed so that they can be change on demand or on system
expansion, using a simple add/replace feature.

• Immediate event management using an auto event reaction setting
Users can set specific reactions for a certain type of events, this allows for the immediate control of typical events, enhancing the monitoring efficiency.

Untitled Document
System Requirement Recommended CPU Intel i7 (Sandy bridge) above
RAM 4 GB above, Video memory 1GB above,
HDD More than 20 GB of free space for installation. (For operation, the system log database requires 10 GB or more free space.), DirectX 8.1 above. Display resolution : 1,280 x 1,024 above, OpenGL compatible
Minimum CPU Intel Core 2 Duo 2.83 GHz above,
RAM 2GB above, Video memory 512MB
Operating System Console (Windows XP 32bit, Windows 7 32/64bit, Windows 8 32/64bit)
System Mananger, Media Gateway (Windows XP 32bit, Windows 7 32/64bit, Windows 8 32/64bit, Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2008

ne_ne_smart_viewer_4.5.name: Smart Viewer 4.5
ne_ne_smart_viewer_4.5.detail:
Smart Viewer 4.5

  
SmartViewer is DVR management software that enables you to connect to and control a remote Samsung DVR on your PC via the network. With this tool, you can access Samsung DVRs anywhere around the world via the network, and check the video data from the connected cameras. You can also search for and play recording data in the DVR on a remote site, which will be an effective and convenient monitoring system. See the list of supported DVRs below.

element.Overview:
Key Features:

• Up to 36 videos monitoring from the connected cameras
• Support for full screen mode
• Video addition to a desired position with the drag & drop method
• Video addition to the video screen by double-clicking
• Support for sequence function (automatic screen transition)
• Favorite view & sequence of favorites
• Up to 16 videos simultaneous playback simultaneously
• Video export (viewer included)
• Search and play recorded data by event type
• User login & access privilege setup
• Save both device and smart viewer configuration as a file
• Log search (search by system, user, record or backup log)
• Automatic self upgrade (connection to Samsung upgrade server)

ip_4__srk_3030s.detail:
SRK-3030S

  
Samsung’s newly introduced 4CH IP Kit with 360˚ view is the only kit on the market that provides greater coverage with less equipment. The addition of the fisheye camera reduces camera equipment and cost! Featuring, high definition video quality, all-in-one solution designed for small business owners, plug and play easy installation, fisheye takes the place of 3-4 cameras, simple setup with wizard for single configuration (set-up NVR and cameras in one shot)

recording_solutions.name: Recording Solutions
recording_solutions.detail: Forward-thinking security professionals have discovered that digital storage and retrieval systems open up all new possibilities in surveillance operations and management. These unprecedented, highly reliable surveillance recording systems provide scalability to meet extended user needs.

digital_video_recorders.name: Digital Video Recorders
digital_video_recorders.detail: Samsung offers a complete range of high performance, H.264 DVRs that are designed to provide high quality images while conserving storage and network resources. From the economical 4 channel models to the full-featured SRD-1670DC, Samsung has a DVR to meet any application requirement.  The SRD series features real-time playback and each unit is capable of recording real-time 4CIF images across selected channels, if not all channels. Convenient back-up is possible with all SRD series DVRs.

encoders_decoders.name: Network Video Encoders/Decoders
encoders_decoders.detail: Samsung offers a number of Network video encoder options that will allow users the ability to upgrade their systems to IP and yet continue to use existing analog cameras.  For smaller systems there are one and four channel models, and for larger systems there is a modular system.  All of these encoders have the network functionality found in our IP cameras.  They feature H.264, MPEG-4, MJPEG multiple CODECs that provide flexibility while conserving network bandwidth and storage.  Samsung encoders, IP cameras, and NVR products do not require the purchase of camera software licenses making installations simpler and lower in overall cost.Samsung offers a standalone 4 channel decoder which provides max. Full HD 1080p video output for a single view and max. HD 720p for quad view mode.

re_di_beyond_series_dvr's.name: Beyond Series DVR's
re_di_beyond_series_dvr's.detail: Samsung's new 1000TVL High Resolution Analog Beyond Series, provides  exceptional image quality, outstanding backlight compensation and multitude of user friendly functions.  The Beyond Series is Samsung's complete analog solution that comprises of 1280H cameras and Digital Video Recorders.

re_di_wisenet_hd+_dvrs.name: WiseNet HD+ DVRs
re_di_wisenet_hd+_dvrs.detail: Hanwha's 1080p HD DVRs, provides exceptional image quality and multitude of user friendly functions. The HD+ Series is Hanwha's complete analog 1080p HD analog solution.

re_di_16_channel.name: 16 Channel DVR Security Systems
re_di_16_channel.brief: Samsung's 16 Channel DVRs are designed to provide high quality images while conserving storage.
re_di_16_channel.detail: Samsung offers a complete range of high performance, 16 Channel DVRs that are designed to provide high quality images while conserving storage and network resources. From the economical SRD-1610D to the full-featured SRD-1670DC, Samsung has a DVR to meet any application requirement.  The SRD series features real-time playback and each unit is capable of recording real-time 4CIF images across selected channels, if not all channels. Convenient back-up is possible with all SRD series DVRs.

re_di_4_channel.name: 4 Channel DVR Security Systems
re_di_4_channel.brief: Samsung offers 4 Channel DVRs that are designed to provide high quality images at low cost.
re_di_4_channel.detail: Samsung offers a range of high performance, 4 Channel DVRs that are designed to provide high quality images at low cost. The economical SRD-450 provides the basic features required for most cost sensitive applications.  The SRD-470DC is a full-featured 4 channel DVR for more demanding requirements. The SRD series features real-time playback and each unit is capable of recording real-time 4CIF images across selected channels, if not all channels. Convenient back-up is possible with all SRD series DVRs.

re_di_hdd_extension_unit.brief: High-capacity external storage device, to compliment Samsung Techwin's DVR range.
re_di_hdd_extension_unit.detail: High data transfer rate, up to 3.0 Gbps (SATA II), ability to install up to 4 SATA Hard Disks. Choose from multiple RAID configurations, includes hot-swappable disk drive bays, Front LCD for RAID status display and USB port for RAID configuration

re_en_decoders.name: HDD Extension Unit Systems
re_en_decoders.brief: Standalone 4 channel decoder which provides max, Full HD 1080p video output.
re_en_decoders.detail: Samsung decoders provide a Full HD 1080p video output for a single view and max. HD 720p for quad view mode. It is able to receive audio and video streams from Samsung network cameras and encoders via an Ethernet network, decode and output them in real-time via its HDMI/VGA interface.

These unprecedented, highly reliable surveillance recording systems provide scalability to meet extended user needs.

st_se_central_video_management_displays.name: Central Video Management Displays
st_se_central_video_management_displays.brief: Powered by Seneca, Samsung offers a wide selection of CVM displays.
st_se_central_video_management_displays.detail: Video management consoleS that puts your live and recorded video right at your finger tips. This full-fledged console has the ability to decode digital video on large scale video surveillance systems with ease. Giving you the ability to take video streams from different locations making it easy to consolidate everything into a single command center. With features such as multi-site management, event popup, and integrated layer maps this Samsung video surveillance solution is the ideal choice for a video management system.

st_se_central_video_management_servers.name: Central Video Management Servers
st_se_central_video_management_servers.brief: Powered by Seneca, Samsung offers a wide selection of CMS servers.
st_se_central_video_management_servers.detail: Utilization of the Management server functions as primary data managements, which allows the Network Video Recorder (NVR) to apply bandwidth to focus of video storage. Using a management server optimizes the use of all other digital security and surveillance appliances such as the NVR and viewing station by distributing bandwidth to reach maximum performance.

st_se_network_video_recorders.name: Network Video Recorders
st_se_network_video_recorders.brief: Powered by Seneca, Samsung offers a wide selection x86 based recording servers.
st_se_network_video_recorders.detail: Samsung offers a range of Network Video Recorders (NVR) that are custom configured for Samsung Net i-Ware, SSM and also VMS partners recording solutions. Powered by Seneca Data, these purpose built systems are engineered to work directly with Samsung VMS and certified VMS partner software, ensuring maximum performance and compatibility guaranteeing a quality surveillance system. The product line comes in range of scalable NVRs including a 16, 32, 64, and 64/72 channel enterprise configuration.

SLA-12240

  
The SLA-12240 C-mount Motorized Zoom Lens has a focal length of 12 - 240mm, is designed to be used with a 1/2" CCD sensor and offers 20x zoom. It also comes with built-in presets. Auto Iris (video) feature produces consistent video signals, and it adjusts camera to changing light levels. The lens operates in the 14 to 122°F (-10 to 50°C) temperature range.

monitors.name: Monitors
monitors.detail: Samsung offers a complete line of professional grade monitors to suit any application. Using Samsung’s exclusive Digital Natural Image engine technology (DNIe) these monitors provide enhanced image reproduction with optimized color, enhanced contrast, and higher resolution.  They also have tempered glass screens that will withstand the type of abuse and cleanings that are common in commercial use environments.

controller_systems.name: Controller Systems
controller_systems.detail: Make sure you get all of the correct accessories needed to install a camera or dome.you need to put Samsung cameras where you need them most.Samsung Techwin offers a  wide range of Camera Lenses, Controllers, UTP devices, Camera housings (indoor and outdoor), mounts and power supplies.

co_re_analog_controllers.name: Analog Controllers
co_re_analog_controllers.brief: Samsung has what you need for camera and system control.
co_re_analog_controllers.detail: From small single camera solutions to large multi-point, multi-user systems, Samsung has what you need for camera and system control.  Our controller line offers a wide variety of protocols and communications interfaces to make system integration possible for a wide variety of applications.  For example, we offer control modules that will take RS-232 serial commands and translate them into coaxial or RS-485 control signals. For larger systems we offer user friendly keyboards such as the SPC-6000 which has a color LCD touch screen with soft keys and controls that can be reversed for either left or right handed operation.

co_re_network_controllers.name: Network Controllers
co_re_network_controllers.brief: Samsung has what you need for network camera & system control.
co_re_network_controllers.detail: From small single camera solutions to large multi-point, multi-user systems, Samsung has what you need for camera and system control.  Our controller line offers a wide variety of protocols and communications interfaces to make system integration possible for a wide variety of applications.  For example, we offer control modules that will take RS-232 serial commands and translate them into coaxial or RS-485 control signals.
